segments.text: How are your wedding plans going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well . We started organizing everything early to avoid a last minute rush to get things done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When will your wedding take place ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At ten o'clock on the morning of next Sunday . We have invited all our relatives to the wedding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will be a large church one . Is your wedding dress ready ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , its design is very elaborate and the designer took many weeks to make it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You will be very beautiful on your wedding day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which hotel will the reception be held at ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's excellent . A friend of mine had her wedding reception there and said it was perfect , though very expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will be expensive , but we think it will be worth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you made the right decision .
segments.speaker: S1
